ActFinancial Administration Act
Borrowing Authority Act, 1996-97
PrecisAuthority to specify $206 billion as the aggregate principal amount of money that the Minister may borrow during the 2008-2009 fiscal year through the issue and sale of Government of Canada securities or other instruments, such as Treasury Bills and Notes. Beginning April 1, 2008 and ending on March 31, 2009.
